CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART TWELVE - PLANNING AND ZONING CODE

TITLE SIX - Zoning

CHAPTER 1264 Districts and Uses Generally

1264.01 ESTABLISHMENT OF DISTRICTS.

1264.02 A-1 AGRICULTURAL DISTRICT.

1264.03 R-1 ESTATE-TYPE RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT.

1264.04 R-1A LOW DENSITY RESIDENTIAL TRANSITIONAL DISTRICT.

1264.05 R-2 LOW DENSITY RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT.

1264.055 R-2A LOW DENSITY RESIDENTIAL REVISED DISTRICT.

1264.06 R-3 MEDIUM DENSITY RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT.

1264.065 RBD RESIDENTIAL BUSINESS DISTRICT.

1264.07 B-1 HIGHWAY BUSINESS DISTRICT.

1264.08 B-2 LOCAL BUSINESS DISTRICT.

1264.09 B-3 CENTRAL BUSINESS DISTRICT.

1264.10 B-4 DESTINATION BUSINESS DISTRICT.

1264.11 M-1 LIGHT MANUFACTURING DISTRICT.

1264.12 M-2 HEAVY MANUFACTURING DISTRICT.

1264.13 PUD PLANNED UNIT DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT.

1264.14 F-P FLOOD PLAIN DISTRICT.

1264.15 ED EMPLOYMENT CENTER DISTRICT.

1264.16 O-R OFFICE-RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT.

1264.17 O-l OFFICE DISTRICT.

1264.18 O-2 OFFICE PARK DISTRICT.

1264.19 TOWN CENTER OVERLAY ZONE.

1264.20 ADD-1, AUSTIN DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT 1.

1264.21 ADD-2, AUSTIN DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT 2.
